title: Fintech Risk & Compliance Dashboard
summary: Built Power BI dashboards integrating SQL, Snowflake, and AWS pipelines to track KYC/AML compliance, fraud risk, and customer onboarding efficiency.
impact: Improved compliance monitoring and reduced manual checks by 30%.

title: Credit Card Spend Optimization
summary: Analyzed 1M+ customer transactions to uncover trends in travel, food, and e-commerce. Delivered insights that shaped credit card rewards and discount strategies.

title: Insurance Claims Analytics
summary: Designed dashboards to monitor claim settlement times and fraud detection triggers. Automated reporting reduced manual processing by 40%.
impact: Enhanced visibility into claims lifecycle and fraud risk indicators.

title: AI Prompt Engineering Playbook
summary: Created reusable AI prompt templates for consulting teams to streamline data storytelling, compliance monitoring, and report drafting workflows.
impact: Cut reporting and analysis drafting time by 25%.
